resources.string: Thank you, see you next time
MYtec is a company formed by 3 members that develop multi-platform applications.
It is an application that allows the relationship between a particular client that has a computer problem and a qualified (computer) volunteer to solve his problem.
Users who want Computer Assistance are registered to the application as clients. And computer users who want to offer their services will register as computer scientists.
How do you contact a computer?

The application, thanks to a job bank, will contact the customer with the most suitable computer scientist due to their type of incident, and they will reach an agreement to resolve the incident. Once the incident is resolved, the customer evaluates the computer
Once registered as a user we go to the section to create an incident, in this window we have to fill out a form where we will explain our problem and the location.
